resources.string: Some Snapdragon Spaces apps contain a digital laser that is controlled by the rotation of the companion controller. For these apps, occasionally the controller orientation may become misaligned with the digital laser, with the controller pointing in one direction with the laser pointing in another.
When this happens, you can re-orient the controller by performing the following steps:
1. Click and hold the RECENTER Button which can be found at the bottom of Controller App while experiencing the offset inside the glasses application. This will freeze the digital laser in place.
2. While holding the button down you can move and rotate the physical phone to attempt to align the rotation with the laser.
3. Once lined up, release the RECENTER button to track to the new orientation setting.
4. You may need to repeat this operation and experiment with different controller orientation offsets in order to achieve proper alignment.
